remarks: The image filter of a filter base is the same as the image filter of its generated filter.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Nov-2009.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)
statement:
elfm2.l $e |- L = ( Y filGen B ) $.
fmfg $p |- ( ( X e. C /\ B e. ( fBas ` Y ) /\ F : Y --> X ) -> ( ( X FilMap F ) ` B ) = ( ( X FilMap F ) ` L ) ) $.
